name: actview
description: Configuration-driven MVVM born for Campaign/Marketing single pages: selector + config for automatic data binding, supporting reactive/ref, computed, watch/watchEffect, JSX rendering, and quick event mounting.

scripts.publish:all: pnpm publish:core && pnpm publish:jsx && pnpm publish:actview
scripts.release: pnpm version:patch && pnpm build:packages && pnpm publish:all
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version:minor && pnpm build:packages && pnpm publish:all
scripts.release:major: pnpm version:major && pnpm build:packages && pnpm publish:all
